document_metadata.title: GreenLang Process Heat Agents - Market Positioning Portfolio
document_metadata.author: GreenLang Product Strategy Team

flagship_platform.elevator_pitch: The command center for industrial thermal operations - delivering 15-25% energy savings through AI-powered multi-agent orchestration.
flagship_platform.value_proposition: Complete process heat orchestration platform that coordinates all thermal assets in real-time, maximizing efficiency while maintaining safety and compliance. Eliminates silos between boilers, furnaces, steam systems, and emissions controls.

target_market.primary: Large industrial facilities (>$50M annual energy spend) with complex multi-asset heat systems
target_market.company_size: Fortune 1000 industrials, Major utilities, Large process manufacturers

key_differentiators: AI-powered multi-agent orchestration coordinating 99+ specialized agents
Zero-hallucination guarantee with SHA-256 provenance tracking
CMMS integration for predictive maintenance coordination

steam_optimization.tagline: Every pound of steam. Every dollar saved.
steam_optimization.elevator_pitch: Unified steam system intelligence that optimizes pressure levels, quality control, and condensate recovery - capturing up to $2M annually in steam losses.
steam_optimization.value_proposition: Complete steam system optimization including IAPWS-IF97 compliant calculations, multi-pressure header optimization, steam quality monitoring, and condensate recovery maximization. Absorbs functionality of steam trap monitoring, steam quality control, and condenser optimization.

target_market.primary: Steam-intensive industrial facilities with complex multi-pressure systems
target_market.company_size: Mid-to-large manufacturers with >50,000 lb/hr steam generation

key_differentiators: Unified platform absorbing GL-008, GL-012, GL-017 capabilities
Real-time steam quality monitoring and control
PRV loss reduction through letdown optimization

combustion_intelligence.elevator_pitch: AI-driven combustion optimization that maximizes efficiency while minimizing emissions - unifying boiler, burner, and flue gas control.
combustion_intelligence.value_proposition: Unified combustion control platform combining boiler efficiency optimization, burner management, and flue gas analysis. Delivers optimal air-fuel ratio, O2 trim, CO optimization, and excess air control for maximum thermal efficiency.

target_market.primary: Combustion-intensive facilities with multiple fired equipment
target_market.company_size: Facilities with >100 MMBtu/hr combined combustion capacity

key_differentiators: Unified platform absorbing GL-002, GL-004 capabilities
Real-time O2/CO optimization with predictive control

combustion_diagnostics.tagline: See inside your combustion. Before problems ignite.
combustion_diagnostics.elevator_pitch: Real-time combustion quality diagnostics with predictive anomaly detection - preventing flame failures before they happen.
combustion_diagnostics.value_proposition: Standalone combustion diagnostics platform providing Combustion Quality Index (CQI) scoring, real-time anomaly detection, and IEC 61511 SIL 2 safety boundary compliance. Identifies combustion issues hours before they become incidents.

target_market.primary: Safety-critical combustion operations requiring early warning

key_differentiators: AI-powered anomaly detection with 4-hour prediction window

heat_recovery.elevator_pitch: Advanced heat integration platform using pinch analysis and exergy optimization to capture every BTU of recoverable waste heat.
heat_recovery.value_proposition: Comprehensive heat recovery optimization with pinch analysis, heat exchanger network synthesis, exergy destruction analysis, and economic optimization. Identifies and prioritizes heat recovery opportunities for maximum ROI.

target_market.primary: Energy-intensive facilities with significant waste heat streams

key_differentiators: Integration with GL-014, GL-015 for implementation

furnace_monitoring.elevator_pitch: 360-degree furnace performance monitoring with tube metal temperature tracking and predictive maintenance integration.
furnace_monitoring.value_proposition: Comprehensive furnace monitoring solution providing real-time performance KPIs, tube metal temperature tracking, hotspot detection, and efficiency trending. Integrates with predictive maintenance for proactive intervention.
key_differentiators: IR camera integration for hotspot detection

steam_trap_monitoring.elevator_pitch: Intelligent steam trap monitoring using acoustic analysis and ML-based failure prediction to eliminate steam losses.
steam_trap_monitoring.value_proposition: Standalone steam trap monitoring platform with acoustic signature analysis, temperature differential monitoring, IR imaging integration, and ML-based failure prediction. Optimizes trap survey programs (TSP) and quantifies energy losses.

target_market.primary: Steam-intensive facilities with large trap populations

key_differentiators: Acoustic signature analysis for non-invasive monitoring
ML-based failure prediction with 30-day advance warning
Mobile inspection app for field surveys

thermal_fluid_analysis.tagline: Know your thermal fluids. Optimize your operations.
thermal_fluid_analysis.elevator_pitch: Comprehensive thermal fluid analysis library supporting 20+ heat transfer fluids with zero-hallucination compliance.
thermal_fluid_analysis.value_proposition: Shared calculation library providing exergy analysis, thermal efficiency calculations, and fluid property management for all GreenLang agents. Supports 20+ common heat transfer fluids with deterministic calculations.

target_market.primary: Facilities using thermal oil, molten salt, or specialty heat transfer fluids

key_differentiators: Integration with all GreenLang thermal agents

emissions_compliance.elevator_pitch: End-to-end emissions compliance platform with EPA RATA automation, emissions trading integration, and carbon offset tracking.
emissions_compliance.value_proposition: Comprehensive emissions compliance monitoring and reporting platform supporting EPA regulations (40 CFR 60, 75, 98), EU ETS, and emerging carbon markets. Automates RATA testing, integrates with CEMS, and provides carbon offset certificate management.

target_market.primary: Facilities with significant emissions reporting requirements

key_differentiators: EPA RATA automation with e-GGRT integration
EU ETS and carbon market integration

fuel_optimization.tagline: Every BTU optimized. Every dollar maximized.
fuel_optimization.elevator_pitch: Multi-fuel optimization platform with real-time calorific tracking, carbon intensity calculations, and intelligent fuel blending.
fuel_optimization.value_proposition: Complete fuel management optimization including multi-fuel switching, calorific value tracking, carbon intensity calculations, and fuel blending recommendations. Integrates with procurement systems for just-in-time fuel optimization.

target_market.primary: Facilities with multi-fuel capability or fuel flexibility needs

key_differentiators: Carbon intensity calculations per fuel source

predictive_maintenance.elevator_pitch: Advanced predictive maintenance using Weibull analysis, MCSA motor diagnostics, and ML anomaly detection - with full CMMS integration.
predictive_maintenance.value_proposition: Enterprise predictive maintenance platform specifically designed for thermal assets. Combines vibration analysis, thermography, motor current signature analysis (MCSA), and ML-based anomaly detection. Integrates with major CMMS platforms for automated work order generation.

target_market.primary: Asset-intensive operations with high downtime costs

heat_exchanger_optimization.elevator_pitch: TEMA-compliant heat exchanger optimization with epsilon-NTU analysis, fouling prediction, and cleaning schedule optimization.
heat_exchanger_optimization.value_proposition: Comprehensive heat exchanger network optimization using epsilon-NTU method, LMTD analysis, and UA degradation tracking. Predicts fouling, optimizes cleaning schedules, and maximizes heat transfer efficiency.

target_market.primary: Facilities with significant heat exchanger networks

insulation_analysis.tagline: Every BTU saved. Every surface optimized.
insulation_analysis.elevator_pitch: AI-powered insulation analysis with 50+ material database, economic thickness calculations, and thermal imaging integration.
insulation_analysis.value_proposition: Comprehensive insulation analysis platform with IR camera integration, drone inspection data processing, economic thickness calculations, and heat loss quantification. Covers 50+ insulation materials for accurate analysis.

target_market.primary: Facilities with extensive hot piping and equipment
target_market.company_size: Operations with >10,000 linear feet of insulated surfaces

water_treatment.elevator_pitch: ASME/ABMA compliant boiler water treatment optimization with cycles of concentration optimization and blowdown control.
water_treatment.value_proposition: Standalone water treatment monitoring and control platform for boiler systems. Optimizes cycles of concentration, automates blowdown control, manages chemical dosing, and ensures ASME/ABMA compliance.

target_market.primary: Facilities with significant boiler water treatment requirements

condenser_optimization.elevator_pitch: HEI Standards compliant condenser optimization with cleanliness factor tracking and vacuum optimization.
condenser_optimization.value_proposition: Standalone condenser optimization platform for power and process applications. Monitors cleanliness factor, optimizes vacuum levels, tracks tube fouling, and maximizes thermal efficiency.

target_market.primary: Power plants and facilities with surface condensers

process_scheduling.tagline: Right heat. Right time. Right cost.
process_scheduling.elevator_pitch: ML-based heat demand forecasting with thermal storage optimization and time-of-use tariff arbitrage.
process_scheduling.value_proposition: Intelligent heat scheduling platform using ML demand forecasting, thermal storage optimization, and production schedule integration. Maximizes time-of-use arbitrage opportunities and coordinates heat loads across facilities.

target_market.primary: Facilities with variable heat demand and TOU tariffs
target_market.company_size: Operations with >$5M annual energy spend and demand variability

economizer_performance.elevator_pitch: Comprehensive economizer monitoring with Verhoff-Banchero acid dew point, steaming detection, and soot blowing optimization.
economizer_performance.value_proposition: Advanced economizer performance monitoring using epsilon-NTU effectiveness analysis, acid dew point margin tracking (Verhoff-Banchero correlation), steaming detection, and soot blowing optimization.

target_market.primary: Facilities with economizers on boilers or HRSGs

Vendor-agnostic - works with any DCS (Siemens, Honeywell, ABB, etc.)
key_talking_points: GreenLang is thermal-first; Siemens is automation-first
We specialize in the 15-25% of energy costs that generic platforms miss
Our agents coordinate specifically for thermal efficiency, not just connectivity

greenlang_advantages: AI-native platform built from ground up (not legacy system retrofit)
Multi-agent architecture for complex optimization scenarios
Faster deployment with pre-built thermal calculation library
key_talking_points: Honeywell Forge was built on legacy Experion - we built for AI from day one
Our 99+ specialized agents outperform generic optimization
We deliver results in 8-12 weeks, not 12-18 months

greenlang_advantages: Thermal-specific optimization vs. general asset performance
Advanced AI/ML models for combustion and steam
key_talking_points: Emerson focuses on asset health; we focus on thermal efficiency
Our combustion and steam agents deliver savings Plantweb cannot
We integrate with Emerson instrumentation AND optimize beyond it

greenlang_advantages: Better suited for thermal-specific use cases
key_talking_points: AspenTech is simulation-first; we are optimization-first
Our agents operate in real-time, not batch mode
We complement AspenTech for customers who have it, and replace it for those who don't need simulation

Our platform connects what point solutions cannot

greenlang_advantages: Proven algorithms and models (years of R&D)

Our zero-hallucination guarantee is difficult to replicate
Focus your engineers on your core business, not software development

discovery_questions: What is your annual energy spend on thermal operations?
How many boilers, furnaces, and heat exchangers do you operate?
What are your biggest pain points with current thermal efficiency?
Are you facing any emissions compliance deadlines?
What is your net-zero or decarbonization timeline?

What is the cost of one hour of unplanned downtime?
Are you using multiple DCS vendors across your facilities?
What is your current thermal efficiency and what is your target?
How much time do your engineers spend on thermal optimization tasks?
